main.name: Nicholas Hale
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Nick! A funny guy with a sharp eye for design. I've been coding for about 2-3 years now. A hard worker with good work ethic, I have studied Full Stack Development. Using technologies such as: HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJs, Figma. As my career as a chef I strated building cooking videos for my social media content as well as lofi hiphop videos. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in coding and my eye for design. With this passion, I have now built over 30 apps and websites. Through live coaching sessions with Clever Programmer, Udemy courses, and videos on Youtube. I have accumulated several thousand views demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by showcasing REAL WORLD projects to enter the world of web development.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: Javascript/ReactJS
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building everything I can, VanillaJs or ReactJs, or Figma, now moving into Flutter mobile development.

work.title: UI/UX courses
work.description: Building everything I can, realated to UI/UX

testimonials.text: Nicholas is persistent and determined in achieving his goal to become a professional software developer. He shows grit, asks the right questions, puts in the work, resourceful and is independent at the same time too
Nicholas' passion for software development is clear and powerful. He is incredibly driven, inquisitive and observant and it shows in his work. It was an absolute pleasure working with him
